titleStmt.title: Londons Artillery briefly containing the noble practise of that wothie [sic] societie: with the moderne and ancient martiall exercises, natures of armes, vertue of magistrates, antiquitie, glorie and chronography of this honourable cittie. By R.N. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Niccols, Richard, 1584-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, and Bernard Allsopp, for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: In the title, the comma after "Artillery" is printed above the line.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Swan
